Captain America.description: A super soldier and leader of the Avengers.

Black Panther.description: King of Wakanda, protector of his people.

Hawkeye.description: Master archer and member of the Avengers.

Thor.description: God of Thunder, defender of Asgard.

Groot.description: A sentient tree and member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.

Magneto.description: Master of magnetism and sometimes villain, sometimes ally.

Hulk.description: The green-skinned powerhouse of the Avengers.

Loki.description: God of Mischief and Thor's brother.

Hela.description: Goddess of Death and ruler of Hel.

Rocket Racoon.description: A genetically modified raccoon and expert marksman.

Mantis.description: A member of the Guardians of the Galaxy with empathic powers.

Hawkeye – Black Widow.description: An expert archer and a master spy team up to save the world.

Hela – Thor – Loki.description: Asgardian siblings with immense power, each with their own agenda.
